chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
Formula: Set
Formulas: Set
System: Type
Term: Set
Terms: nat -> Set
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
equal: fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
atomic: forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L
impH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
notH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
forallH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
orH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
andH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
existH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
iffH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
ifThenElseH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
SysPrf: fol.System L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop

Goal:
forall (T : System) (v : nat) (s : Term) (f g : Formula), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))

Premises:
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
Functions = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Functions : Language -> Set
arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat
In_freeVarSys : forall L : Language, nat -> fol.System L -> Prop
substituteFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
Relations = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Relations : Language -> Set
Trying to mask the absolute name "Terms"! [masking-absolute-name,deprecated]

inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L

substituteFormulaImpNice : forall (L : Language) (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}), (forall q : nat * fol.Term L, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}, (forall q : nat * fol.Term L, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : nat * fol.Term L, substituteFormulaImp L f z1 g z3 q = substituteFormulaImp L f z2 g z4 q
Formula_depth_rec2_imp : forall (L : Language) (Q P : fol.Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : fol.Term L, Q (fol.equal L t t0) -> P (fol.equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (fol.atomic L r t) -> P (fol.atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : fol.Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (fol.impH L f f0) -> P (fol.impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) ->...
substituteFormulaImp : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L), (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}) -> forall g : fol.Formula L, (nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (fol.impH L f g)}

iffI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g)
andI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T g -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.andH L f g)

```coq
intros T v s f g H H0.
apply iffI.
- apply substituteFormulaImpNice with (z1 := (v, s)) (z2 := (v, s)) in H0.
  destruct H0 as [H1 H2].
  apply H1.
  reflexivity.
- apply substituteFormulaImpNice with (z1 := (v, s)) (z2 := (v, s)) in H0.
  destruct H0 as [H1 H2].
  apply H2.
  reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros T v s f g H H0. apply iffI. - apply substituteFormulaImpNice with (z1 := (v, s)) (z2 := (v, s)) in H0. destruct H0 as [H1 H2]. apply H1. reflexivity. - apply substituteFormulaImpNice with (z1 := (v, s)) (z2 := (v, s)) in H0. destruct H0 as [H1 H2]. apply H2. reflexivity.
